textTemplates.name: email
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I'm happy to hear that you're planning to run the Peer Mentorship Curriculum at {!$Record.Account.Account_Name_Formula__c}! I'll reach out again around {!friendlyPMCcheckindate} to see if you have a clearer idea of how you'll be running the program. However, if you figure things out sooner, feel free to use this link anytime to update us on when and how you are running Circles: Circles PMC Update Form. We will then send the password to the licensed, non-watermarked videos (in the meantime, preview them privately using the password below).

Preview the Curriculum

Here are the links to the curriculum and to preview the videos for each session:

  • Curriculum resource page: where you can access the training materials, lesson plans, and more.
  • Preview the videos here for each Circles session.

Video Password: ldcircles_free.preview

Warm Regards,

{!default_owner_fields.FirstName} {!default_owner_fields.LastName}
LiveDifferent

textTemplates.name: email_1_Devina
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I'm happy to hear that you are running the Peer Mentorship Curriculum at {!$Record.Account.Account_Name_Formula__c}! You might find this video walking through the Circles Resource Page to be helpful as you start. If you have any questions or need support, please feel free to email or call me any time at {!default_owner_fields.Phone}.

What we ask of you is to help us capture certain info so we can track the impact the program is making. We will send you the form you just filled out with the details on your Circles program(s) to update periodically. At the end we have a Leadership Certificate for you to offer your student leaders that get involved.

Cheers!

{{!default_owner_fields.FirstName}}

textTemplates.name: Email_1_No_Program_Activity
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I'm happy to hear that you planning on running the Peer Mentorship Curriculum at {!$Record.Account.Account_Name_Formula__c}! I'll reach out again around {!friendlyPMCcheckindate} to see you have a clearer idea on how you are running the program. Or if you get things figured out sooner, you are welcome to use this link anytime to update us on when and how your are running Circles: Circles PMC Update Form

In the meantime if you have any questions or need support during your planning, please feel free to email or call me any time at

textTemplates.name: email_3_reminder
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I noticed that you haven't registered your use of Circles Peer Mentorship Curriculum at {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.Account.Account_Name_Formula__c} yet, and I wanted to check in. We're always looking to improve our program and support, so I'd love to hear about any challenges, confusion or friction-points you've encountered while reviewing the curriculum that prevented you from moving forward.

Or, if are still planning on using the curriculum but need some implementation ideas or help, I'd be happy to set up a brief chat. You can schedule a time that works for you using this link.

Your feedback would be incredibly valuable in helping us better support other educators like yourself. Feel free to reply to this email with any thoughts or concerns, or grab a time in my calendar.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,
{!default_owner_fields.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: email_reminder_1
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

I hope you are doing well. I am checking in to see how your planning is shaping up to run the Circles Peer Mentorship Curriculum at {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.Account.Account_Name_Formula__c}!

If you can fill out this form as soon as possible, it will help us track along with when, and how, you are running Circles. We will also send you the password for the licensed, non-watermarked videos as soon as we receive your form response.

Cheers!

{!default_owner_fields.FirstName}

textTemplates.name: email_reminder_2
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.FirstName},

Just thought I'd follow up again about Circles at {!$Record.Contact_Survey__r.Account.Account_Name_Formula__c} - any idea yet when you will start running it?

If you can fill out this form as soon as you know, that will be greatly appreciated. We will send you the password for the public use, non-watermarked Circles episodes as soon as we receive it.

Cheers!

{!default_owner_fields.FirstName}
